name: Color Reflexes
description:
Color Reflexes is a reflexes game.

  • Increasing Difficulty as your score grows
  • Has an Online Highscore System (except Web Build)
  • Compliments according to your score
  • Please note that your score will always stay on our High Score System Severs
  • Happy Playing :D

Socials:-
